channel.title: Mentor's House Music Podcast
channel.description: Tune in for the latest House mixes by DJ/Producer Mentor. Playing all the latest House, Electro, Techno, Tech-House, minimal, and classics...
channel.itunes:subtitle: House, Electro, tribal, techno, progressive, dance, club, pacha, crobar, ibiza, wmc, miami, space, minimal, funk, nyc, underground, disco
channel.itunes:author: DJ/Producer Mentor
channel.itunes:summary: Tune in for the latest House mixes by DJ/Producer Mentor. Playing all the latest House, Electro, Techno, Tech-House, minimal, and classics...

item.title: UNIVERSAL RHYTHM SESSIONS - EPISODE 001 - DJ REALIZM
item.description: WE KICK OFF THE ALL NEW UNIVERSAL RHYTHM SESSIONS PODCAST SERIES WITH A MIX BY MY GOOD FRIEND DJ REALIZM. STRAIGHT OUTTA JERSEY, THIS DJ PACKS SOME FUNK WITH SOME GROOVY BEATS TO KEEP YOU ROCKIN. THIS IS A MIX RECORDED DURING A WEEKLY SHOW HE AND A FEW OTHER FRIENDS HOST AT WWW.EMBERRADIOLIVE.COM FOR MORE INFO ON DJ REALIZM CHECK OUT HIS FACEBOOK AT WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/DANNY.RODRIGUEZ.5817 HOPE YOU ENJOY IT AND AS ALWAYS FEEL FREE TO HIT US UP WITH SOME COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS ON HERE OR LOOK FOR ME ON FACEBOOK AT WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/JOHNRIVASMUSIC
item.dc:creator: DJ/Producer Mentor

item.title: Episode 30 - June 2012 - House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Its been a while since I did a House mix. Hope you all enjoy this. New improved changes coming to the podcast soon. Stay tuned...

  1. Miou Miou - Original Mix - Sami Wentz
  2. Mascarade - Rodriguez Jr. Remix - Felix Cage
  3. Nothing But Love - Denied Remix - Sascha Riot
  4. Deepnatura - Original Mix - Out of Rand
  5. Ora Et Labora - Redondo Remix - Domus, Eddu Reig
  6. Made in Belfast - Original Mix - Cash Only
  7. Love and Imitation - Peter Horrevorts Remix - Infusion
  8. Be Free - Original Mix - Manuel Sahagun
  9. FIsh and Chips - Denied Remix - Luca Bernardi
  10. Villa Trip - Simone Vitullo Remix - Marcelo Castelli
  11. In My House - Original Mix - Abel The Kid
  12. Soul Power - Dante & Remmy Mix - Sliced Funk
  13. Screenplay - Original Mix - Jaimy

item.title: Episode 27 - March 2012 Tribal Tech House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor House music podcast. In an effort to bring you up to date with the past 2 missing episodes I will be adding them along with this months session. Stay tuned for my newest releases coming out soon on Coraza Recordings. Contact me at mentorio@aol.com with comments or questions. - mentor

  1. Here It Comes - DJ Wady & Ray MD
  2. Hope - Rene Amesz, Ruell
  3. Pan De Azucar - Dario Nunez, J.glass
  4. Bushstyle - Stefano Noferini
  5. Femme Drums - Sebastian Xottelo
  6. Twisted Disco - Lauer, Carnard, Greg Note
  7. Vuela Paloma - DJ Chus - Abel Ramos & Raul Cremona
  8. Samba - Todd Terry - Matteo DiMarr's Old School Meets New School Remix
  9. We Go - Matt Samuels
  10. Fierce - Wally Lopez, Richard Dinsdale
  11. The Player - Carl Cox - Midnite Sleaze Remix
  12. Get Up - Dave Rose, Will Clarke
  13. Mambara - David Herrero - Paul Strive Remix
  14. Disko - Matt Samuels

item.title: Episode 24 - December 2011 Tribal Tech House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays to everyone and thank you for tuning into the last episode of 2011. This episode features new music by artists, Reza, Prok & Fitch, Wally Lopez, MYNC, Loko, David Herrero, Mario Ochoa, D-Formation, Victor Arias, Charlie Solana and Hector Couto featuring remixes by Alex Kenji, David Herrero, Massivedrum, Dubfire, Erippio, and myself. Hope you enjoy these 60 minutes of non stop energy. Enjoy. Also don't forget tech house and tribal producers don't forget, please email me your demos to mentorio@aol.com I am currently doing A&R for Southside Recordings.

 

  1.  Bakongo - Original Mix - Reza
  2.  Cabala - Alex Kenji Dub Mix - Prok & Fitch
  3.  No Pare La Musica feat. Laura Woods - Original Mix - Wally Lopez, MYNC, Laura Woods
  4.  Super Hero - David Herrero Remix - Loko
  5.  Sundari - Loko Remix - Dave Kurtis
  6.  La Cacimba - Dub Mix - David Herrero
  7.  Friend Request - Original Mix - Mario Ochoa
  8.  Bongo Mondo - Erippio Mix - Hector Couto, EET
  9.  Mad - D-Unity Remix - D-Formation, Oscar L
  10.  You Know What It Is - Original Mix - David Herrero
  11.  Vientos En Altas - Original Mix - Victor Arias
  12.  Tengo Coconuts - Mentor Remix - Charlie Solana
  13.  Hey Everybody - Massivedrum Remix - Josh The Funky 1, Christian Vila
  14.  That Ginger Ponytail - Dubfire Remix - Davide Squillace, Guti

item.title: Episode 23 - November 2011 Tribal Tech House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thanks for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor podcast. In this months mix  I get deep, dark and tribal featuring some of the latest tracks on Coraza Recordings by artists, Stereo Soldiers, Mike Vale, Dynamik Dave, Rikard and Aruzda. Also new tracks by Sergio Fernandez, Jake Childs, Frank Garcia, Danny Serrano, Carlo Lio, and DJ Chus. Hope you enjoy this one. Stay tuned for new music coming out soon on Coraza Recordings, shout out to Deka. Remember to post your comments or questions here of email me at mentorio@aol.com

-mentor

 

1. Wasabi - Origina Mix - Danny Serrano, Gonzalo, Gonzalo (Spain)

2. Am I Getting Crazy - D Rod's Not So Crazy Remix - Stereo Soldiers

3. Hmm - Original Mix - Mike Vale, Dynamik Dave

4. In The Zone - Carlo Lio Mix - MC Flipside

5. Tazoc - Original - Rikard, Aruzda

6. Tazoc - Kult of Krameria Remix - Rikard, Aruzda

7. Need It - Original Mix - Frank Garcia

8. Never Miss - Original Mix - Sebastien Rebels

9. Vivan Las Lolitas - Original Mix - Sergio Fernandez

10. Wamba Sax - Frank Garcia Remix - Luis Pitti, Alex Marinez

11. The Art of Chaos - Original Mix - Jake Childs

12. A Night Summer Dream - Sebastian Manuel & Honey Dijon Mix - DJ Chus

13. Pretty Woman - Original Mix - Mike Vale

item.title: Episode 22 - October 2011 Tech House / Tribal House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor House music podcast. In this month's episode you will hear some of the freshest tracks in the Tech House genre. New tracks available on Southside Recordings with music by Rich Gior titled " House Train" available now on Beatport.com and a new dope remake of a classic by QBA & Manny Cabrera remixed by Southside mastermind Charlie Solana. Don't forget to check out my latest releases on Soundgroove Records NYC out on Beatport.com now. Stay tuned for new updates and upcoming releases. Find me on facebook.com/johnrivasmusic 

Also tech house and tribal producers don't forget, please email me your demos to mentorio@aol.com I am currently doing A&R for Southside Recordings.

  1.  Zinder - Original Mix - Pierre Deutschmann
  2. The Da (Charlie Solana Mekkanikal Remix) - QBA & Manny Cabrera
  3. Fact - Original Mix - Stefano Noferini
  4. Good Music feat. Dan Diamond - Vlada Asanin Remix - John Aquaviva, Alex D'Elia, Nihil Young
  5. Wraps Around Me - Original Mix - Terry Knuckles
  6. Roenka (No Vocal Mix) - Gideon
  7. Broken - Original Mix - Alexander Seretti
  8. Back That Up - Original Mix - Antranig
  9. In The Music - Original Mix - Alexander Seretti
  10. House Train - Original Mix - Rich Gior
  11. Don't Turn Your Back - Stefano Noferini Remix - Olav Basoski, DJ Erick E
  12. Dark Night - Original Mix - Mentor
  13. Keep The Change - Fran Guzman Remix - American DJ
item.dc:creator: DJ/Producer Mentor

item.title: Episode 21 - September 2011 Tech House / Tribal House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor House music podcast. In this month's episode I am featuring 2 of my latest remixes, available soon at Beatport.com. The first remix is Robi Uppin's latest track titled "Just As I Do(Both Gone) Mentor Remix and will be released this month on Soundgroove Records (NYC). The second remix is Mike Ivy's latest track titled "Suck It" Mentor Remix available soon on Southside Recordings (Miami) with more remixes coming soon by Chriis Cruz, Nino Bellemo, Charlie Solana and Rich Gior. Be sure to check out these and more upcoming tracks available soon on Beatport.com

 

  1. Won't Stop Rocking - Original Mix - Antranig
  2. Work It - David Penn Remix - Muzzaik
  3. Are You Ready? - Original Mix - Jose Nunez, Antranig
  4. Saborete - Original Mix - Tox-D!, Jacobo Palacio
  5. Mi Chamaca - Original Mix - Jose Galvis
  6. Just Do It Again - Mentor Remix - Robi Uppin
  7. Bum Bom - Original Mix - Adam K, Matteo DiMarr
  8. Work It Out - Original Mix - Jesse Garcia
  9. Freak Like This - Original Mix - Carlos Fauvrelle
  10. Suck It - Mentor Remix - Mike Ivy & John Spinosa feat Everette Haley
  11. Don't Let You Go - Muzzaik Remix - Robbie Taylor
  12. Monkeydance - Original Mix - Muzzaik
  13. One Step - Original Mix - Almaru
  14. Love Me Now feat. Corey Andrew - Peter Horrevorts Remix - Jesse Garcia

item.title: Episode 20 - August 2011 Tribal / Tech House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Prepare to shake your a$$es with the newest edition of the DJ Mentor House music podcast. In this months episode I am featuring an arsenal of tracks by an amazing Colombian Producer / DJ by the name of Steven Kass.  Also check out the latest release by DJ Mike Ivy & John Spinosa featuring Everette Haley titled "Suck It" available very soon on Beatport on Southside Recordings. Once again thank you for tuning in to another episode, hope you enjoy the sounds and please hit me up with comments, questions or suggestions via facebook or folow me on twitter… - Mentor

  1. Dance For Me - Original Mix - Steven Kass
  2. Voces Holandesas - Steven Kass Remix - Hever Jara 
  3. Jasmin Garden (Check Baby) - Steven Kass Mix -  DJ Disciple, Stefan Vilijn
  4. Essence African - Steven Kass Mix - Ruben Amaya
  5. Changes - Original Mix - Steven Kass
  6. The Flavor - Steven Kass Remix - Santiago Moreno
  7. Can't Stop - Dario Nunez Remix - Oscar Cano, Freddy Marquez
  8. O'Rox Drums - Peter Presta & Little Carlos Remix - Peter Presta & Little Carlos
  9. Dark Sun - Original Mix - Kevin Ayala
  10. Suck It - Original Mix - DJ Mike Ivy & John Spinosa feat. Everette Haley
  11. El 14 - Original Mix - Diego Karrillo
  12. The Cry - Original Mix -Edgar Aguirre
  13. In The Music - Original Mix - Roderick Fox

item.title: Episode 19 - July 2011 Tech House / House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor's House music podcast. This months episode features a new remix of Chad Andrew's newest release titled "Reiki" remixed by Southside Recordings label owner Charlie Solana. I had the privilege of hearing Charlie drop this track at Mekka afterhours a couple of weeks ago, and I have to say I was hooked instantly. Shout outs to Charlie and the whole Southside family. In news, I will also be doing A&R for the label so please send me your original projects to mentorio@aol.com or simply hit me up on facebook at www.facebook.com/johnrivasmusic 
  1.  Groove Amigos - Original Club Mix - 123XYZ 
  2.  Deviact - Original Mix - Wally Lopez, MYNC
  3.  Sticky Fingers - Original Club Mix - Rene Amesz, Ruell
  4.  1008 - Hever Jara Remix - Vetto
  5.  I Want It - DJ PP Mix - DJ Vandersames, Rob Barbosa
  6.  Reiki - Charlie Solana & MOLtechster Remix - Chad Andrew
  7.  Zul - Original Mix - Dario Nunez, DJ Montxo
  8.  Para Bailar - Original Mix - Mastiksoul , David Jones, Aquadiva
  9.  Fucking House Musik - Original Club Mix - Stefano Noferini
  10.  Yo Amigee - Original Mix - Santos Resiak, Subb-an
  11.  Tekhuma - Ismael Rivas Factomania Remix - Danny Serrano, Hector Couto
  12.  Feelin - Original Mix - Detlef
  13.  This is Acid - Boys Noize Re-work (Mentor Edit) - Maurice Joshua

item.title: Episode 18 - June 2011 Tech House / House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor House Music podcast. This episode features some of the latest tracks by some of todays hottest House and Tech House producers. I have also included my latest remix project for NYC label Sound Groove Records titled "First Love" by Tribal Injection which will be available on June 10th 2011 at Beatport.com along with other remixes by Sound Groove's own Midnight Society and Will Monotone. Hope you enjoy the show and please feel free to post some comments or questions.

  1. Mareme - DJ PP Remix - Hector Couto
  2. Magenta - DJ PP Remix - A.D.M
  3. Vibrate 2011 - Zoltan Kontes, Jerome Robins Mix - Big Black Boot
  4. Together - Original Mix - Nic Fanciulli, Joris Voorn
  5. Get Down In My House - O.B. Lakotas Mix - Peter Presta, O.B.
  6. Spend My Money - Midnite Sleaze Dub - Bass Kleph, Stellar MC
  7.  The Distortion - Miami Husslers Remix - Midnite Sleaze, Lost In Waves
  8. Pressure - Original Mix - Alex Kenji, Starkillers, Nadia Ali
  9. Minerva - Original Mix - Marc Galindo
  10. First Love - Mentor Remix - Tribal Injection - Soundgroove Records

item.title: Episode 17 - May 2011 Tech House/ House Mix - DJ MENTOR
item.description:
Thank you for tuning into another episode of the DJ Mentor House music podcast. This hour features some of the latest Tech House and House releases by some of todays freshest producers. Hope you enjoy the sounds and please feel free to comment or send a message, would love to hear from you. Peace

-mentor

  1.  Four Hours - Zoltan Kontes & Jerome Robins Remix - Hector Couto 
  2.  Pajaros del Monte - Original Mix - Dario Nunez, DJ Fist
  3.  Para Ti - Nick & Danny Chatelain Remix - Reekay Garcia
  4.  In Your Face - Abel Ramos Munich with Love Mix - Thomas Gold
  5.  Get Down - Get Down
  6.  Con La Mano Levantada feat. Bobkomyns - Original Mix - Dario Nunez, J. Glass
  7.  Apache - Original Mix - Sabb
  8.  En Fuego - Original Mix - Dave Rose, DJ Deka
  9.  B-gees - Original Mix - Dario Nunez, Groovebox
  10.  Desmond - Original Mix - Robert Hein
  11.  Daiquiri - Original Mix - Jose De Mara, Javi Colina
  12.  The Group feat. Clarence - Nick & Danny Chatelain Remix
  13.  Spec Ops Two - Original Mix - Lutzenkirchen
  14.  Carny - Heartik & Rainer Weichhold Theatre Remix - Pleasurekraft

item.title: Episode 14 - October 2010 HOusE MiX - DJ MENTOR

item.title: Episode 13 - September 2010 House Mix - Part 2 - DJ Mentor
item.description: Here is another installment to the September 2010 podcast. I hope you are all enjoying the mixes. The podcast has grown throughout these couple of years and I want to thank you all for the continued support. With over 20,000 downloads on podomatic so far this year and ranked #22 on the overall Podomatic House music podcast list. I will continue to post new episodes bi-weekly. Hit me up with some comments, questions or suggestions. I would love to hear what you guys think of the mixes and also any suggestions as to any genre's of electronic music you guys are favoring more. As you know I am doing my best to stick to my tribal sound added with some of the latest tech house, electro and progressive tracks available. Also don't forget to add me on facebook at www.facebook.com/johnrivasmusic

item.title: EPISODE 11 - April 2010 House Music Podcast Mix
item.description: I’ve been meaning to post this mix for about a month now but just never got around to it. Hope you all enjoy it. Please hit me up with some comments or questions. -john rivas Also be sure to check out my latest release “For You” featured on this years Southside Recordings WMC Sampler. Available for download at Beatport.com And can’t forget my Soundgroove Records debut release of “Time Coded” available now on Beatport.com More music coming soon as well as new mixes every month.

item.title: EPISODE 8 - November 2008 Podcast Mix
item.description: Hope you are all well, it's been a long time since I have posted anything new. Well here it is, once again hope you enjoy this set full of tribal percussion, electro riffs, and build ups full of energy. Hit the pages up with some comments, questions, etc. Peace - mentor

item.title: EPISODE 6 - May 2008 Tribal House Mix by DJ Mentor
item.description: Finally, finally, finally...I know, I know, its been like 3 months!!! But unfortunately for me my music can't be my first priority...atleast not yet. Been busy with school and working... gotta pay the bills some how. Someday if more of fans like you, and i say YOU because you're probably a fan if you're reading this right now, lol. But as I was saying maybe someday if i have more fans out there I may be able to dedicate all my time and energy to the music we all love. But for now, I hope you enjoy my latest mixture of percussive and electric sounds I've put together featuring some of the hottest tracks out right now. Enjoy and please keep up the emails, comments etc. It means alot to hear from the listeners. Peace - mentor

item.title: Episode 5 - February 2008 House Podcast - DJ Mentor
item.description: Finally had the opportunity to record another set I hope you all enjoy. Please send me some comments and let me know what you think of the show. Would love to know who's out there listening. Send me emails on myspace at www.myspace.com/djmentor or IM me at mentorio@aol.com For those of you having trouble downloading off the site, log onto www.mentor.podcastpeople.com for more options... more mixes coming soon!!!

item.title: BONUS BEATS...ON THE FLY MIX SOMETIME IN 2006
item.description: This mix has some very eclectic tracks, ranging from the current tracks during that time in the summer of 2006 as well as some oldies taken off some vinyl i had sitting in a crate. Check out the peace division tracks throughout the mix, insane!!!. enjoy
